subject: Subprime Mortgage Crisis
Basketball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Over all, N.B.A. attendance is flat from last season to this one, but it is hard to ignore anecdotal reports that things are worse than the official numbers indicate.
snippet: Over all, N.B.A. attendance is flat from last season to this one, but it is hard to ignore anecdotal reports that things are worse than the official numbers indicate.
